item.title: @elonmusk: Robotaxi rides without any safety monitors are now publicly available in Austin. Starting with a few...
item.description: Robotaxi rides without any safety monitors are now publicly available in Austin. Starting with a few unsupervised vehicles mixed in with the broader robotaxi fleet with safety monitors, and the ratio will increase over time.

item.title: @elonmusk: ELON MUSK: "I'd like to understand the meaning of life. Is the standard model of physics correct reg...
item.description: ELON MUSK: "I'd like to understand the meaning of life. Is the standard model of physics correct regarding the beginning of existence & the end of the universe? What questions do we not know to ask that we should ask? AI will help us with these things."

item.description: Teams encapsulated the@USSpaceForce‚Äôs GPS III-9 satellite into Falcon 9‚Äôs fairing ahead of arriving at the hangar at pad 40 in Florida. Liftoff is targeted for 11:46 p.m. ET on Sunday, January 25 ‚Üíspacex.com/launches/gpsiii9

item.title: @elonmusk: Elon's closing in Davos: ‚ÄúI would encourage everyone to be optimistic and excited about the future, ...
item.description: Elon's closing in Davos: ‚ÄúI would encourage everyone to be optimistic and excited about the future, and generally for quality of life, it‚Äôs better to er on the side of being an optimist and being wrong, than a pessimist and right‚Äùxcancel.com/i/status/2014371322365‚Ä¶

item.description: 1995: Elon Musk is replacing a broken side window himself with parts from a junkyard because he couldn‚Äôt afford repairs. 2026: A Tesla Robotaxi driving fully autonomously on busy roads in Austin with no safety monitor in the car.

item.description: Exactly. Thank you for speaking up.

item.title: @elonmusk: IS GERMANY‚ÄôS FREE SPEECH DOOMED? Not at all! One of the most internationally covered free speech tri...
item.description: IS GERMANY‚ÄôS FREE SPEECH DOOMED? Not at all! One of the most internationally covered free speech trials in Germany just resulted in VICTORY: David Bendels (@Deu_Kurier), after having been sentenced to 7 months on probation for a MEME, is FREE. It seems, U.S. attention on the case intimidated the authorities‚Ä¶

item.description: ELON MUSK: "I've been asked a few times like, do I want to die on Mars? And I'm like, Yes, but just not on impact." ü§£

item.description: A driverless Tesla Robotaxi. No one in the car. No safety driver. Fully autonomous. This is actually happening.

item.title: @elonmusk: VP JD Vance in Minneapolis: ‚ÄúWe're not trying to send a political message. We're trying to enforce t...
item.description: VP JD Vance in Minneapolis: ‚ÄúWe're not trying to send a political message. We're trying to enforce the law.‚Äù

item.title: @elonmusk: ELON MUSK: "In the future, the robots will make so many robots, that they will actually saturate all...
item.description: ELON MUSK: "In the future, the robots will make so many robots, that they will actually saturate all human needs, meaning you won't be able to even think of something to ask the robot for at a certain point, like there will be such an abundance of goods and services. There'll be more robots than people. I think everyone on earth is going to have one humanoid robot because you would want a robot to watch over your kids, take care of your pet, take care of elderly parents. I'm very optimistic about the future. I think we're headed for a future of amazing abundance, which is very cool. Definitely we are in the most interesting time in history."
